attributes.action: order the Home Office to scrap the extra fee payable for renewal of a standard adult passport during the postal strike because of the uncertainty over how long the strike is going to last.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Passport Offices charge GBP97.00 or GBP114.00 for renewal of an adult passport when application is made through personal visit to the office.  At the moment the ONLY way to obtain passport renewal is by personal visit to the passport office.  The postal strtike, therefore, is being used as a cash cow by the Home Office to increase its revenue while the public, the taxpayer, who is already paying for the service is now being made to pay extra for a situation which is outside the control of the paying public - appalling!
